name: A Hell of a Mix-Up
description:
There's been a mix-up for newly-departed souls, for some reason everyone is being routed through hell!  Upper management doesn't want to deal with the paperwork, so now it's up to you in the HSC (Hellish Service Center) to make sure everyone get's routed where they need to go. Be wary, however, as all may not be as it seems!

If you can get everyone assigned to the correct place, you're guaranteed a promotion!
